characteristic.name: Measurement Interval
characteristic.description:
The Measurement Interval characteristic is used to represent the time between measurements.
The structure of this characteristic is defined below.

fields.name: Measurement Interval
fields.description: The values of this field are defined below.

values.description:
Duration of measurement interval. 65535 seconds is equal to 18 hours, 12 minutes, and 15 seconds.
Unit: org.bluetooth.unit.time.second
